Item ID12273

The Bandos cloak is part of the Bandos vestment set and can be obtained by completing medium Treasure Trails. A minimum of level 40 Prayer is required to wear one.

It is also more sought-after because it's a convenient item to have as your Bandosian item within the God Wars Dungeon.

 Attack bonuses

The Bandos cloak has been fixed graphically.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Prior to an update on 14 August 2014, the Bandos cloak alongside the Bandos mitre could not be obtained from level 2 Treasure Trails.

[[File:Bandos cloak detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''Bandos cloak''' is part of the [[Bandos vestment set]] and can be obtained by completing [[Clue scroll (medium)|medium]] [[Treasure Trails]]. A minimum of level 40 [[Prayer]] is required to wear one.

It is also more sought-after because it's a convenient item to have as your [[Bandos item|Bandosian item]] within the [[God Wars Dungeon]].

==Trivia==
